basics.name: Samuel Wakoli
basics.label: Full Stack Developer (Backend Heavy)
basics.summary: I am a self-taught full-stack software developer with over three years of specialized experience in mobile application development, proficient in Flutter and native Android development using Kotlin as my primary programming language, complemented by expertise in Dart and JavaScript. My technical stack encompasses Jetpack Compose for Android front-end development and Flutter for cross-platform solutions, while leveraging Firebase and Google Cloud Platform for robust back-end infrastructure.

experience.summary: Engineered responsive Flutter applications. Implemented comprehensive backend solutions using Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Cloud Functions). Integrated Stripe payment gateway and Gemini AI for resume summaries.
highlights: Reduced application load time by 30% through performance optimization.
Integrated AI services using Google's Gemini API.

experience.summary: Built feature-rich Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. Integrated Firebase Realtime Database for offline-first experiences.
highlights: Migrated legacy XML layouts to Jetpack Compose.
Developed efficient background services using WorkManager.
